nodes.text: Heavy Soldiers were specialized heavy weapons specialists within the Rebel Alliance and the New Republic, equipped with DLT-19 heavy blaster rifles or Z-6 rotary blaster cannons, capable of inflicting devastating damage, particularly to shields. They wore light armor to aid in mobility.
Heavy Soldiers appear in the 2014 mobile game Star Wars: Commander and in the 2017 videogame Star Wars Battlefront II, although with a different appearance.
